Description: Validate that the search bar filters products based on user input.
Preconditions: Application is running, user logged in
Test Steps:
1. Open the LuxeWalk homepage.
2. Enter a valid product name in the search bar.
3. Press 'Search'.
Expected Result:
Products matching the search query are displayed.
User-friendly message appears if no matches are found.

Description: Ensure filters apply correctly based on user-selected criteria (e.g., price, category).
Test Steps:
1. Go to the category page.
2. Select a category and price range.
3. Observe the filtered product list.
Expected Result: cars are filtered correctly based on the selected criteria.

Description: Verify the checkout process prompts the user to fill in required information before placing an order.
Test Steps:
1. Add cars to the cart.
2. Navigate to the checkout page.
3. Attempt checkout without entering personal information.
4. Enter info and retry.
Expected Result:
User is prompted to fill out the required form if details are incomplete.
Order is placed upon valid input.

Description: Test that clicking on a product redirects to its dynamic car detail page with correct data.
Test Steps:
1. Open the product listing page.
2. Click on any product.
3. Verify that the product detail page loads with accurate information.
Expected Result: Dynamic carpage loads correctly with product-specific data.

Description: Verify user dashboard shows order status when logged in.
Preconditions: User is logged in and has orders
Test Steps:
1. Log in with a valid user account.
2. Navigate to the dashboard.
3. Check order status information.
Expected Result: Dashboard displays the order details (e.g., active, pending, completed orders).

Description: Verify that if user writes a review about any car
Expected Result:
1. Go to the product detail page.    
2. Write review and submit. 
3. Validate it shows in the UI correctly.
Actual Result: It accepts input correctly and shows it in the UI after submission.
column11: It accepts input correctly but does not display properly in the UI.

Description: Test API error handling and request sanitization
Preconditions: It should show fallback error message
Expected Result: It will show fallback error message.

Description: Test app on different screen sizes for responsiveness
Preconditions: It should be responsive on all screens
Test Steps: 1. Open inspect tool and change screen size using browser dev tool.
Expected Result: It should be responsive on all screens.
